problem.markdown:
1. Tangential Acceleration at a point on a link is not proportional to ?
() Angular acceleration of the link () None of these (x) Angular Velocity of the link () Radial distance to the point on the link
2. Which amongst the following are not defined in case of a rotating link?
(x) All mentioned accelerations are defined () Tangetial Acceleration () Total Acceleration () Centripetal Acceleration
3. Angular acceleration of input link rotating with a constant angular velocity is ?
() unity (x) zero () not defined () can not be determined without link length
4. Tangential Acceleration at a point on a link ?
(x) is perpendicular to the link () None of these () is parallel to the link () is at 45o to the link in the direction of motion
5. Centripetal Acceleration at a point on a link does not depend on ?
() Radial distance to the point on the link () None of these (x) Angular acceleration of the link () Angular Velocity of the link
